relation: Killed the enemy after you died

Killed an enemy shortly after diving to prone

Kill an enemy by shooting them in their head
Killed an enemy with a long distance shot
Killed the enemy (at full health) with one shot from a Sniper Rifle
Kill the enemy who killed you last
Kill an enemy who is injuring a teammate

textBeforeTable: Kill Medals The table below will list all medals in alphabetical order. At this time, it is far from complete. Feel free to add those you earn, but please stick to the format. Medals are basically XP Bonuses in Multiplayer. They are awarded alongside a small amount of Experience Points every time the condition is met.
